overview: Sinister pimp Roman Todd makes naive young twinks fall in love with him so he can turn them out to hustle sugar daddies for cash. In an effort to make Roman happy, lovestruck Jaimie Steel picks up muscular Billy Santoro in a bar and proceeds to use his best sexual tricks to seduce the lonely, older man. Meanwhile Shane Omen sets his sights on the hugely hung Hugh Hunter, and convinces the lustful older stud that he's desperate for Daddy love. Is the lure of a hard cock stronger than hard cash? Watch and find out.
tagline: These bad boys need a daddy who can fill all their needs.
title: Sugar Daddies 4
